00094             function                process_data_field( $ProcessingString , &$Changed )
00095             {
00096                   try
00097                   {
00098                         for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 
00099                                                                                                 'data_field' , array( 'id' => TERMINAL_VALUE ) ) ; )
00100                         {
00101                               $this->Settings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
00102                               
00103                               $Template = '<input type="text" name="'.$this->Settings->get_setting( 'name' ).'" value="'.
00104                                     $this->DataExtensionAccess->get_data( 
00105                                           $this->Settings->get_setting( 'id' ) , $this->Settings->get_setting( 'type' ) , 
00106                                           $this->Settings->get_setting( 'name' ) 
00107                                     ).'">';
00108                               
00109                               $Template = str_replace( '{class}' , 'width_320 flat' , $Template );
00110                               
00111                               $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{data_field:$MacroParameters}" , $Template , $ProcessingString );
00112                               
00113                               $Changed = true;
00114                         }
00115                         
00116                         return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
00117                   }
00118                   catch( Exception $e )
00119                   {
00120                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00121                   }
00122             }
00123             
00150             function                process_get_data( $ProcessingString , &$Changed )
00151             {
00152                   try
00153                   {
00154                         for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 
00155                                                                                                       'get_data' , array( 'id' => TERMINAL_VALUE ) ) ; )
00156                         {
00157                               $this->Settings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
00158                               
00159                               $Data = $this->DataExtensionAccess->get_data( 
00160                                     $this->Settings->get_setting( 'id' ) , 
00161                                     $this->Settings->get_setting( 'type' ) , 
00162                                     $this->Settings->get_setting( 'name' )
00163                               );
00164                               
00165                               $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{get_data:$MacroParameters}" , $Data , $ProcessingString );
00166                               
00167                               $Changed = true;
00168                         }
00169                         
00170                         return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
00171                   }
00172                   catch( Exception $e )
00173                   {
00174                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00175                   }
00176             }
00177             
00208             function          process_string( $Options , $ProcessingString , &$Changed )
00209             {
00210                   try
00211                   {
00212                         list( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) = $this->process_data_field( $ProcessingString , $Changed );
00213                         
00214                         list( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) = $this->process_get_data( $ProcessingString , $Changed );
00215                         
00216                         return( $ProcessingString );
